name: xinema-editor
description: AI-powered video essay clip matching tool

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Xinema/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd Xinema/backend && npm run dev" "cd Xinema/frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend

author: William Meng <billmengg@example.com>
